@_alice_evans @NateMJensen Yes no tax break is better, but nonetheless a huge loss that Amazon didn't come, just as immigrants are a big gain for Queens. Comparison holds up. Not every subsidy to immigrants is a good idea, either.
@_alice_evans @NateMJensen That is not money NY is forking over, it is a credit against future taxes. With Amazon not coming the money simply is not there. And Medicaid is a major expense for NY/NYC!

@_alice_evans You don't think immigrants are also receiving some local subsidies through Medicaid, public education, etc.? And by no means do all pay income tax. Amazon pays state tax, huge payroll tax, its workers pay income tax, partial incidence on Amazon.
